title: Karen Hall â€“ Breathworks: Mindfulness Techniques to enhance communication during presentations
description: The Mind that helps create an excellent piece of research is the same Mind that trips us up when we have to present it - training the mind and body to work effectively together in stressful situations is the result of the discipline of mindfulness practice. In this session, you will learn some simple techniques to use every day that will reduce the anxiety, stress or nervousness that prevent you from being at your best when communicating your ideas or making formal presentations.
